text: Aleksandr Leonidovich Zaitsev (; 19 May 1945 – 29 November 2021) was a Russian and Soviet radio engineer and astronomer.Picture of Alexander Zaitsev during the ERAC Conference at the Starkenburg Observatory in Heppenheim, Germany, in 2004; http://www.setileague.org/photos/eurose04/euro0407.jpgOfficial picture of Alexander Zaitsev – http://www.spacedaily.com/images/seti-alexander- zaitsev-bg.jpgSummary – http://www.daviddarling.info/encyclopedia/Z/Zaitsev.html He worked on radar astronomy technology. His best known works were near-Earth asteroid radar research, and SETI. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Russian astronomers
title: Alexander Zaitsev (astronomer)
